title: Beautiful tucked away community located in the heart of Bella Vista
description:
Welcome to Carriage Mews, a beautiful tucked away community located in the heart of Bella Vista and the Meredith School Catchment, offering 1-car garage parking and a quiet shared courtyard. This 3 bedroom, 2.5 bathroom, extra wide townhome has been nicely updated and maintained throughout the years. Enter directly through the garage to the first floor featuring an open kitchen and dining area, a large pantry, a conveniently located half bath and a coat closet. The updated kitchen with newer stainless-steel appliances, quartz countertops, a nicely tiled backsplash, gas cooking, and an island for additional storage and counterspace. The spacious dining room (could also double as additional living space) features a wood burning fireplace and glass siding doors overlooking the beautiful well-manicured courtyard. Up the stairs is an oversized living room with hardwood floors, built-in cabinets, a ceiling fan and a large storage closet. This floor also features two nicely sized bedrooms both with closets and great natural light, a laundry closet, and a full bathroom with a tub. Continue up to the beautiful primary bedroom with south facing sliding glass doors to the Juliette Balcony, a wall of closets and access to your private bathroom with a tub and stall shower. Off the bedroom is a bonus living space and additional closets, great for a home office, playroom or an additional lounging area. Lastly, exit out to the private deck with tree top views, perfect for relaxing with a good book. Many recent updates: new Anderson doors & noise cancelling windows (2019), HVAC (2021), washer & dryer (2017), kitchen appliances (2019), and more! Plenty of storage throughout the home as well as in the garage. Located on a quiet street just off Cianfrani Park. Quick walk to Whole Foods, ACME, the Italian Market and some of the city’s best restaurants. Immediate move-in available.
705-11 Pemberton St #711

description:
1529 Green St is a beautiful and updated 1 bed, 1 bath condo located in the highly sought-after Fairmount/Art Museum area of Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. The unit features modern finishes, hardwood floors throughout, a spacious bedroom, and access to a private back patio. title: 3B/4Br townhouse with amazing view close to Penn
description:
This is the residence you have been waiting for! (Available 6/24/2023)
This trendy, modern and spacious 3 bedroom, 4 bath, 2100 square foot brick townhome is ideally located on a quiet low traffic street in the sought after Graduate Hospital neighborhood. Perfect for 2-3 roommates or a family.
Impressive features include a garage with inside access, a fully finished basement, and spectacular city skyline views from the amazing rooftop deck. Rich hardwood floors, high ceilings, recessed lighting and a Juliet balconies add to the spacious feel of this home. North/South exposure allows for an abundance of natural light throughout the day.
Enter through the front door to find a the first bedroom with access to a cozy back patio and a modern full bath. Upstairs is a state of the art kitchen with granite counter tops, a breakfast bar, stainless steel appliances and rear balcony access. Off the kitchen is an open concept floor plan including the large living and dining area and sliding doors to the front Juliet balcony. The third floor offers the master bedroom with a large walk through closet and an en-suite bathroom with a 2 in 1 (shower + bathtub) and marble counter-top vanity. A second bedroom is located down the hall along with a full bathroom with shower. The fully finished basement is well suited for an office/play room with a full bath, laundry and ample storage area.
Location is terrific!!!!
It is with easy access to South Street Bridge, walking distance to Penn, CHOP. A quick walk to Center City, Fitler and Rittenhouse Squares. There are great dining options, Sidecar, Honeys, Starbucks ect. Amazon South-street hub is just a 5 mins walk away. Grocessy shopping and nearby playgrounds are within 5 mins.
Indego Bike share is just around the corner, Septa 7, and 17 are within One block.

description:
Enter the front door into an inviting fireside living room with red oak hardwood floors that carry throughout the majority of the home. Enjoy the high ceilings with recessed lighting in the family room, plenty of natural light from the windows, and a full-view glass door that leads outside to a 27 x 24 EP Henry patio and expansive rear yard. title: New fully rehabbed apartments offer modern living in a historic distri
description:
Welcome to 1924 Spruce St! Nestled in the desirable Rittenhouse Square neighborhood, these new fully rehabbed apartments offer modern living in a historic district. The building has been home to prominent Philadelphia families such as Dr. John Hooker Packard, one of the most prominent American surgeons of the late 19th century; and the Philadelphia lawyer, Earl B. Putnam. Later covered to apartments in 1945, the most recent renovation was finalized in October 2022. The building holds eight (8) stunning brand-new units offering high-end appliances, including trash compactors, elevator access and lovely views of Center City. There are a variety of floor plans available for those seeking 1 to 3 bedrooms and you won't have to worry about laundry, as each apartment has a wash/ dryer in the unit. With so many attractions nearby, this location is the epitome of ideal: steps away from Rittenhouse Park, Starbucks, restaurants, shopping, and so much more.
